resources.string: One thread is created for each work item. The time measured is from before thread start until after all threads have been joined.
One thread is created for each work item. The time measured is the time it takes to complete the work in all threads, excluding thread start and join delay.
Each unit of work is executed on a thread pool with unlimited size.
Each unit of work is executed on a thread pool with a fixed size equal to the number of processor cores.
